about_the_game:
An all new heroine type, the "Overly Serious and Reserved Proper Lady" makes her appearance in Custom Order Maid 3D2!

You can now hire “Proper Lady” as a maid at the Empire Club, just like you can “Muku,” “Majime,” and “Rindere.”

～Who is this Overly Serious and Reserved Proper Lady?～
A polite, diligent, and proper lady who's perfectly suited to maid work. She's an especially accomplished cook who can make meals that rival even those of a professional chef. While she is an exceptionally capable maid, her overly serious nature makes her somewhat inflexible. She has a hard time being honest about her feelings, and her facial expressions are less varied than other maids'. With regard to sexual matters, she is determined to pleasure her master through her service as a maid. Because she's so emotionally reserved, open displays of affection make her blush...

A step up from normal personality packs! This DLX edition contains the new 2-person dance “rainy unbalance.”
On top of that, DLX edition personality packs come with a new underwear set.
Of course, just like normal personality packs, Proper Lady’s signature maid outfit and hairstyle are included as well.
*All costumes included in this DLC are compatible with the High Poly Body. Check it out if you have COM3D2.5!

•1 costume compatible with both the Normal and High Poly Body!
•1 new lingerie set compatible with both the Normal and High Poly Body!
•1 new hairstyle set compatible with both the Normal and High Poly Body!
•New 2-person dance “rainy unbalance”!
•Proper Lady is compatible with over 160 yotogi skills！
•2 Pure Love ADV H-events！
•4 NTR ADV H-events！
•Compatible with Guest Mode! With an all-new guest for Proper Lady to attend to!
•Proper Lady’s signature maid outfit and a new hairstyle added！
•Tons of training, work, and pre-yotogi scenes all around the Empire Club to enjoy with Proper Lady！
•New events featuring Proper Lady interacting with Muku, Majime, and Rindere！

"Proper Lady" is not compatible with the following DLC.
For compatibility with each of the listed DLC, please purchase the compatibility DLC packs separately.

CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2 GP-01
CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2＋ GP-02
CUSTOM ORDER MAID 3D2＋ GP-01Fb

We are currently in the process of developing "GP-01Fb" for "Proper Lady."
Even in Japan, GP01, GP02, and GP01Fb are at different stages of development for each heroine type.
After development for a given heroine has finished in Japan, that content must be translated.
We appreciate your understanding that this takes some time.
We are doing our best to complete development and release content quickly, so please be patient.

content_descriptors.notes:
This game contains adult content intended for individuals 18 years of age or older.
It includes nudity, sex scene, and blatantly sexual imagery, as well as imagery that has sexual implications.
If you are not yet 18+ or if you are accessing from any country or located where adult material is specifically prohibited by law, do not play this game.

You can now hire “Proper Lady” as a maid at the Empire Club, just like you can “Muku,” “Majime,” and “Rindere.”
